titleInfo.title: Tensas River in Singer Game Preserve.

mods.abstract: Singer Tract (later Chicago Mill and Lumber Company Game Refuge and Reserve), now part of Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge, Madison, Tensas Parishes. Camera looking down a bank to two women near pirogues in a river.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Ecology and Conservation, The Percy Viosca Jr. Collection
